title: Where do I access clips saved from replays?
body: Had something funny happen in an ARAM and recorded it. Used the button to record (little red dot), but didn't see where it was saved. Anyone know where to access it?

replies.body:
You can access recorded highlights from the following directory:

> **C:\Users\Example_Username\Documents\League of Legends\Highlights**

Let me know if you have any questions! ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gYgRInNP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-24T02:08:59.519+0000)
>
> You can access recorded highlights from the following directory:
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions! ^.^

Got it, thank you

Follow up question: How do I view the clips?

Simply double-click on the recorded highlight and it should launch in your default web browser. These highlights are stored in files that should be viewable in most web browsers.

I hope this helps!
